remarks: Transfer universal quantification from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2014.)
statement:
ralxfr.1 $e |- ( y e. C -> A e. B ) $.
ralxfr.2 $e |- ( x e. B -> E. y e. C x = A ) $.
ralxfr.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ralxfr $p |- ( A. x e. B ph <-> A. y e. C ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
